Metadata.title: Fun117
Metadata.description: A Next.js enthusiast with a focus on web development. Passionate about building with Next.js and actively involved in developing web applications, websites, e-commerce sites, and databases.

Footer.footerText: Copyright Â© 2024 Fun117. All rights reserved.

Metadata.title: Contacts
Metadata.description: Please feel free to contact us using the contact information below. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

top-content.title: Fun117 is engaged in a wide range of creative projects
top-content.description: Primarily, they develop websites and applications, while also creating mini-games and custom features using commands in Minecraft, as well as developing mods.

description.title: As a trusted partner in the digital realm, we drive the success of your projects.
description.description: We act within feasible boundaries, without accepting unreasonable requests, and consistently strive to learn new technologies and stay informed. We ensure project success in an ever-evolving digital environment.

1.title: Next.js Rich Template
1.description: This project is a Next.js template aimed at providing a robust starting point for building modern web applications. It comes with pre-configured localization support, theme toggling, and various other features to streamline development.

2.title: Scratch Auth
2.description: Scratch Auth is a simple OAuth service for Scratch. It provides developers with an easy-to-understand API and users with a smooth login experience. By using @scratch-auth/nextjs, you can easily implement OAuth functionality into your site.

3.title: Scratch Building
3.description: Scratch Building is a game developed on the Scratch platform, and this repository serves as its official website. It provides various features including account authentication, commenting, notifications, and community engagement.

1.question: What are the charges for a request?
1.answer: We offer a wide range of pricing options from free to paid. Currently, we generally accept requests for free.
